text: Gavin Joseph Watson (12 July 1948 â€“ 26 August 2019) was a South African businessman. He was Chief Executive Officer of State Capture-implicated company, African Global Operations, previously known as Bosasa, from 2000 until his death in 2019.10 things we know so far after the death of Gavin Watson , News24, 26 August 2019. Retrieved on 26 August 2019.Gavin Watson killed in car crash , eNCA, 26 August 2019. Retrieved on 26 August 2019. Watson died in a car accident on 26 August 2019, near O. R. Tambo International Airport in Johannesburg at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:South African businesspeople
